sqlMap.select: SELECT SUBT1.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.PRJ_ID ,A.REQ_ID ,A.SIGN_ID ,A.PROCESS_ID ,A.SIGN_PREV_FLOW_ID AS PREV_FLOW_ID ,A.SIGN_FLOW_ID ,A.SIGN_USR_ID ,B.USR_NM AS SIGN_USR_NM ,SF_ADM7000_DEPT_NM('jht1215_GRP', B.DEPT_ID, '2') AS SIGN_USR_DEPT_NM ,( SELECT SUB_CD_NM FROM ADM4100 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = 'jht1215_GRP' AND MST_CD = 'ADM00007' AND SUB_CD = B.USR_POSITION_CD ) AS USR_POSITION_NM ,A.SIGN_CD ,A.SIGN_REJECT_CMNT ,A.SIGN_DTM ,A.REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.REG_USR_IP FROM REQ4900 A LEFT JOIN ADM2000 B ON ( A.SIGN_USR_ID = B.USR_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC ) SUBT1 WHERE 1=1 AND SUBT1.RN = 1
